attributes.action: Put a cap on the amount any one person can be paid in a year.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i cannot believe that some people are being paid upto and some times over £1 Million pounds a year for doing jobs like tv presenter or radio dj or even company exects.i even read in a national newspaper today that somebody is actually being paid £6 Million pounds a year of the publics money.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
